modName: Pricier and Heavier Pelts and Hides
summary: This mod changes the weight of hides and pelts to be more realistic and also makes them produce more leather. It makes them worth more as well! It also changes the weight of some scenery items like pots and kettles, and gives Lockpicks a weight of 0.1!
descriptionHtml:
[b]Heavier Pelts and Hides[/b]

This mod is primarily aimed at roleplayers! It changes the weight of pelts and hides to be more realistic, and also makes them worth some more coin.

If you fancy yourself a hunter, this mod is definitely something you want!

Heavier Pelts and hides is tuned towards the idea that you cannot carry an endless amount of pelts and hides around. The weights themselves might not be realistic, but they\'re high to imitate bulk and size of pelts.

[b] Change log:[/b]

v0.2 - Includes an increased number of pieces of leather being crafted from pelts. A single pelt will now create it\'s equal weight in leather.

v0.3 - Updated weights and worths. Removed lockpick and misc. item weight changes.

I personally play this mod with a maximum carryweight of 50. My stamina level-ups still make it higher than that, but I feel this is a somewhat balanced carry weight.
author: xxlebox
